text: The English Spy is the fifteenth in Daniel Silva's Gabriel Allon series. It was released on June 30, 2015 and reached the top of the New York Times bestseller list on July 19. With the ever-changing political climate, he faces challenges in writing an Israeli protagonist. ==References== ==External links== *The English Spy Category:Novels by Daniel Silva Category:2015 American novels
title: The English Spy
